Package studentinfo.project3

Class Roster

java.lang.Object
studentinfo.project3.Roster
public class Roster extends Object
This class contains methods that perform actions that replicate a student roster
Author:
Steven Tan, David Fabian

    private int

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Roster()
    Constructs an instance of the Roster object Holds the student roster array and the current size of the student roster

  • Field Details

    • roster

      private Student[] roster

    • size

      private int size

  • Constructor Details

    • Roster

      public Roster()
      Constructs an instance of the Roster object Holds the student roster array and the current size of the student roster

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Student student)
      Searches whether a given student is in the roster If the student is not found in the roster, -1 is returned. If the student is found in the roster, the index of the student is returned.
      Parameters:
      student - the student that is to be found
      Returns:
      -1 the student is not found, the index of the student otherwise

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the array capacity by 4 This method will be called when the roster is full after a student has been recently added

    • add

      public boolean add(Student student)
      Adds a student to the end of the roster If a student has been added and the roster is full, the size of the roster is increased by 4
      Parameters:
      student - the student that is to be added
      Returns:
      true the student has been found, false if the student has not been added otherwise

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Student student)
      Removes the student requested in the parameter After a student is removed, all the students after the index of the student removed are shifted over by 1
      Parameters:
      student - the student that is to be removed
      Returns:
      true the student has been successfully removed, false if the student is not in the roster

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Student student)
      Checks if a student is in the roster
      Parameters:
      student - the student that is to be added
      Returns:
      true the student is in the roster, false if the student is not in the roster otherwise

    • print

      public String print()
      Prints the students by their profiles This method sorts the students by the profiles. This is done by comparing the student's first and last names, as well as their date of births.
      Returns:
      a String representation of all students in the roster sorted by profile

    • printByStanding

      public String printByStanding()
      Prints the students in order of their academic standing This method sorts the students by their academic standing. This is done by comparing the number of credits completed
      Returns:
      a String representation of all students listed by standing

    • printBySchool

      public String printBySchool()
      Prints the students in order of their school This method sorts the students by their school. This is done by comparing the student's majors and schools
      Returns:
      a String representation of all students listed by school

    • listBySchool

      public String listBySchool(String school)
      Prints the students in order by last name, first, DOB by a specified school This method sorts the students by their profile. This is done by comparing the student's majors and schools Then it prints the students that are in the specified school
      Parameters:
      school - the specified school for the listing
      Returns:
      a String representation of all students listed within a specific school

    • printGrads

      public String printGrads()
      Prints all the students in the roster that can graduate with the number of credits currently completed.
      Returns:
      a String representation of all students that can graduate

    • changeMajor

      public void changeMajor(Student student, String major)
      Changes a student's major to the specified new major This method finds a specified student. If the student does not exist, nothing occurs. If the student is found, the student's major instance is changed to the new major
      Parameters:
      student - the student whose major is being changed
      major - the student's new major

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the roster array is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the size of the roster is 0; false otherwise.

    • student

      public Student student(Student findStudent)
      Retrieves the student on the roster list with an identical Profile as the given student.
      Parameters:
      findStudent - the Student object that is used to find an identical one in the roster.
      Returns:
      the instance identical to the one given; if there is none that is identical, null is returned.
